description: An all-star comedy cast hams it up in this hilarious Biblical spoof.
keywords: bible spoof,burning bush,reference to the parting of the red sea,prophet,israel
name: Wholly Moses!

review.name: Took Turns Sleeping Through It...
review.reviewBody: True Story: One of my older brothers moved into a new apartment in suburban Denver and one day, he invited a few of us family members and a couple of friends over to his new place. He invited us to watch this movie because it just happened to be debuting on cable TV that week. One of my brother's friends said he was looking forward to watching John Ritter's cameo. We gathered around the TV and when the movie started, we found it to be so unfunny, we took turns sleeping through it. After the movie was over, the friend asked if John Ritter was even in the movie. I pointed out that Ritter was in the movie but since he had slept through his one scene, he missed Ritter entirely. I have nothing more to add.
